holidays.title: Macintosh Computer Day
holidays.description: Macintosh ushered in a new age of freedom and creativity.

holidays.title: National Beer Can Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Drink to the historic, monumental, and thirst-quenching day beer was first sold in cans.

holidays.title: National Compliment Day
holidays.description: You never know when someone could use some good vibes, so give a compliment!

holidays.title: National Peanut Butter Day
holidays.description: Crunchy or smooth, today we put down our phones and pick up our spreading knives.

holidays.title: Belly Laugh Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a laugh-riot, and learn about the funny side of life!

holidays.title: Change a Pet’s Life Day
holidays.description: Our efforts to save the world through pet adoption prove that not all heroes wear capes.

holidays.title: International Day of Education
holidays.description: Elizabeth Warren said, “A good education is a foundation for a better future.”

holidays.title: International Mobile Phone Recycling Day
holidays.description: “The forest is calling” and so are we — to take a good look at your mobile!

holidays.title: National "Just Do It" Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a change because you're finally going to “Just Do It!”

holidays.title: National Lobster Thermidor Day
holidays.description: Get your knives and forks ready because you're about to crave some succulent Lobster Thermidor!

holidays.title: National Matthew Day
holidays.description: Happy National Matthew Day, and double kudos if it is also your birthday!

holidays.title: Paul Pitcher Day
holidays.description: Drink ale, and line up your pitchers, it’s time to celebrate the Conversion of St. Paul!

holidays.title: Speak Up and Succeed Day
holidays.description: Take a deep breath and raise your voice this Speak Up and Succeed Day.

holidays.title: Talk Like a Grizzled Prospector Day
holidays.description: Hold a baby buggy in place as we muck deeper into this annual gold bonanza.

holidays.title: Unification Day
holidays.description: The “not so little union” is celebrated today, and we have all the facts you need to know!

holidays.title: Briston Maroney’s Birthday
holidays.description: “American Idol” semifinalist Briston Maroney is a bold and determined artist producing catchy tunes.

holidays.title: Daveed Diggs’s Birthday
holidays.description: A man of many talents — is there anything that Daveed Diggs cannot do?

holidays.title: James Kennedy’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has worked with notable artists such as Katy Perry, Taio Cruz, and Ke$ha.

holidays.title: Johnny Orlando’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented singer, actor, and songwriter, nothing is holding him back!

holidays.title: Kenya Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kenya Moore has overcome many challenges to get to where she is today!

holidays.title: Neil Diamond’s Birthday
holidays.description: Neil Diamond’s career has spanned five decades and is popular with people of all ages.

holidays.title: Regé-Jean Page’s Birthday
holidays.description: Read on to find out more about this actor's diverse background and acting history.
